name: Class Notebooks Free
description:
PLEASE DO NOT RATE THIS APPLICATION 1 STAR:  - IT IS SUPPOSED TO BE SIMPLE! - IT IS BEING DEVELOPED! - IT IS VERY LOW COST!  Its the end of the semester and your phone gallery is completely disorganized? Do you know where you can find that important picture you took from that class months ago?   That mess is about to end using Class Notebooks!  This app is design to help students organize photos from whiteboards, documents and other pictures related to classes. You can create a notebook with all photos you took during the class and add comments, change date and order.   It is also possible to crop and edit pictures using simple touches.   This app used a special compression designed to lower the storage requirements for the pictures stored inside notebooks. You can find all pictures on directory dcim
otepads or inside your gallery app.  Backup and restore to google drive are supported. You will never lose your class notebooks even if you change your phone.   Print your notebook sharing your photos as a PDF file! Send your whole notebook to another App user as a Zip file!  Simple to use! Practical and easy to learn!
